name: Dungeon Tycoon
description:
Welcome to Hell!

Wait.. that doesn't sound good... Well dang! You aren't gonna let a lil thing like being stuck in Hell stop you are you?

Let's make some GOLD!

Click your way to riches! Who knows what will happen!?

Ok, but for reals, Dungeon Tycoon is a clicker/idle/rpg set in Hell. It starts off as a clicker, giving you full control, then, as you purchase upgrades, the characters will begin to do the work for you. Later on, more gameplay elements will be unlocked. This game is being made by one person and is about 5 days into development (04/07/19). Updates will be added to the DevLog below! Donate if you like, and feedback is most welcome! You can also catch me on Twitter @_Cytronix_

All art/scripting/stuff is done by me,

the audio however is as follows:

"Professor Umlaut" and "Eternal Terminal"
by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
